<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>x_1434439_my_tem_0.emapp_wfh</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript( /* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
    /* Optional EmailOutbound */
    email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
    /* Optional GlideRecord */
    event) {

    // Add your code here
    
        if (current.your_work_status == "wfh")
            template.print("to work from home");
        else
            template.print("for time off");

})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>1732a25c1b2202105db8c1c4f7130bc4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1434439_my_tem_0.emapp_wfh</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_1732a25c1b2202105db8c1c4f7130bc4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
